document.full_text: shooting broke out on monday between forces of two of the warlords who helped install president alassane ouattara. it is not clear if he can control them.
document.title: feud imperils fragile peace in ivory coast
lines_and_colors: shooting broke out on monday between forces of two of the warlords who helped install president alassane ouattara. it is not clear if he can control them.
